author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Whoa! Twinkle Khanna's little daughter Nitara turns 'Thor' - Entertainment
text:
Twinkle Khanna with daughter Nitara 
Bollywood actress-turned-writer Twinkle Khanna just shared the cutest photo of her little daughter Nitara!
Twinkle Khanna's daughter Nitara turned 'Thor' and her mommy dearest took to Twitter to share the snapshot.
While posting the photo, Twinkle Khanna wrote, "Why settle to play the helpless princess when you can be the hammer-wielding Thor #HammeringItIn"

HERE'S THE PHOTO: 
Why settle to play the helpless princess when you can be the hammer-wielding Thor #HammeringItIn pic.twitter.com/pL21DFvNDW 
â€” Twinkle Khanna (@mrsfunnybones) 2 February 2017 Isn't she adorable?
